code: import React,{useState}from'react';import logo from'./logo.svg';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[userInput,setUserInput]=useState('');const handleInput=event=>{setUserInput(event.target.value);};const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();alert(userInput);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{classname:"app-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Type Something Intelligent...",value:userInput,onChange:handleInput,className:"input",name:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",classname:"submit-button",children:" Submit "})]})});}export default App;/* From Uiverse.io by Yaseen549 */
